content: hey s hers kiss materials needed hershey s kiss top hershey s kiss bottom  small amounts less than 1 skein with gray with gray of worsted weight yarn round 1 make magic_ring magic_ring 6 single_crochet in round 1 make magic_ring magic_ring 6 single_crochet in in gray white blue and black  stitch marker ring 6 sts place marker in first st for beg of ring 6 sts  crochet hook in size f round move marker up as each round is completed round 2 2 single_crochet in each st around 12 sts  fiberfill stuffing round 2 single_crochet in each st around 6 sts round 3 *2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next st  large tapestry needle round 3 *2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next st repeat from * around 18 sts  scissors repeat from * around 9 sts round 4 *2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 2 sts  2 6-mm safety eyes round 4 single_crochet in each st around 9 sts repeat from * around 24 sts stitches & techniques round 5 *2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 2 sts round 5 *2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 3 sts repeat from * around 12 sts repeat from * around 30 sts  single_crochet single_crochet  chain chain round 6 single_crochet in each st around 12 sts round 6 *2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 4 sts  magic_ring make magic_ring round 7 *2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 3 sts repeat from * around 36 sts fasten_off alternately you can chain 2 repeat from * around 15 sts leaving a long tail for sewing to the top piece 6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook round 8 *2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 4 sts line up stitches from the top and the bottom  whipstitch repeat from * around 18 sts and whipstitch together when the piece is  f/o fasten_off round 9 *2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 5 sts almost closed up stuff firmly finish stitching copyright and permissions repeat from * around 21 sts
